other_tests.procedure_name: Emergency left-sided frontotemporoparietal craniotomy and evacuation of the EDH
other_tests.findings: Postoperative abnormal results: international normalized ratio 1.73 (control 1.0), prothrombin time 21.7 seconds (control 11.5–15 seconds), activated partial thromboplastin time 32.2 seconds (control 25–36 seconds), and fibrinogen 1.12g/L (control 2.0–4.0 g/L).
other_tests.changes_over_time: The child made a satisfactory recovery and had a mild right upper-extremity paresis, which gradually improved with physical therapy.

other_tests.procedure_name: Genetic analysis for Type I collagen genes
other_tests.findings: The child was heterozygous for the missense mutation c767G/H11022T, pG256V at exon 16 of COL1A2, consistent with OI.
